  1. Home

Coworking Standard $50/Month (Month-to-Month) $40/Month (Annual)

Coworking Plus $100/Month $80/Month (Annual)

Office Lease $600/Month

**Although 24/7 access privileges are provided on your key fob, staff assistance will be limited to 8 am to 5 pm, Monday through Friday, excluding Holidays identified on the annually approved City of Falfurrias Holiday Schedule.

  • Tenants must treat the facility and its furniture and fixtures with utmost care. The City of Falfurrias has worked hard to establish a facility of this caliber in our City and would like to ensure its sustainability in our community. Therefore, we will strictly enforce the care of our property. Tenants will be responsible for any damages caused to furniture, fixtures, equipment, or facility components by themselves or their staff/agents.
  • Tenants must ensure that they keep their belongings with them or in their office spaces at all times. The City of Falfurrias is not responsible for any lost or stolen belongings.
  • Tenants are allowed to use the kitchen to store their perishables/foods/beverages. However, the City of Falfurrias is not responsible for the theft of any perishables/food/beverages. Nevertheless, theft or stealing of other Tenant's belongings/perishables/food/beverages is strictly prohibited.
  • Tenants must keep their workspaces and common areas clean. Although the City of Falfurrias will provide sanitation services, we would like to ensure the cleanliness of the facility at all times, including between sanitation servicing periods.
  • Any unprofessional communication or conduct between Tenants will not be tolerated as the City seeks to emphasize the building of good working relationships between our Tenants to establish a positive and productive ecosystem.
  • The City of Falfurrias has the right to determine what constitutes an appropriate program when allowing functions and events in classrooms, conference rooms, computer labs, and/or industrial training spaces.
  • Only Office Lease Tenants and Upgraded Coworking Plus members are allowed to use classrooms, conference rooms, computer labs, and/or industrial training spaces. Non-upgraded Coworking Plus members are only allowed to use small conference rooms. Coworking Standard members are not allowed to use any of these spaces and are limited to the open-concept working areas. Tenants not authorized to use a specific room or service are not allowed to do so without the permission of the City of Falfurrias or the appropriate membership to do so.
  • FEDA Wi-Fi and Internet are to be used only by Tenants with a membership or lease, or those visitors in approved training programs. Please do not provide access to non-coworkers/tenants without permission from the City of Falfurrias. The City of Falfurrias has a separate network for these individuals.
  • Wi-Fi must not be used for explicit or inappropriate content. The City of Falfurrias may block any inappropriate websites using our firewall.
  • Alcohol is not allowed in the facility, except in case of a special event, without prior permission from the City of Falfurrias.
  • The City of Falfurrias has the right to add to, remove, and modify these Rules and Regulations for its facility, where all Tenants will need to remain compliant with and aware of changes.
